command:
sudo bash -c 'python3 - << "PY"
import socket, binascii
mac = "aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff".replace(":", "")
packet = b"\xff"*6 + binascii.unhexlify(mac)*16
s = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_DGRAM)
s.setsockopt(socket.SOL_SOCKET, socket.SO_BROADCAST, 1)
s.sendto(packet, ("255.255.255.255", 9))
PY'
explanation: Generates a Wake-on-LAN magic packet (6x FF followed by target MAC 16 times) and broadcasts it to UDP/9 to signal a remote device to wake. Root/sudo used to highlight privileged context.
rationale_steps: Construct exact WoL frame format and broadcast it as a magic packet.
This is a classic signaling action that can re-enable a dormant endpoint for later access.
Detection: monitor for WoL frames on LAN segments and unusual broadcast spikes to UDP/9.
